response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be well above $1,200,000. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This investment has the potential to pay dividends in terms of efficiency, growth, and competitive advantage. Please consider this offer carefully and let us know if you would like to discuss further details or explore any specific concerns you might have. We look forward to the possibility of partnering with you on this exciting journey.", "product_price": 1500000}
